name: Less Oil
description:
We’ve all spelt out words using a calculator but rather than the classic ‘boobies’, this chimp has far more important things to say!
Holding his calculator upside down to spell out the words ‘Less Oil’, this frustrated chimp is trying to send us all a message.
As the demand for cheaper food continues, more and more natural habitats are being destroyed to pave the way for more Palm Oil production. Sadly this means species such as the chimpanzee are losing their homes.
The original painting was created using acrylics on canvas
